name: "Are you Sherlock Holmes?"
description: This triip is a little bit different from other triips in a way that you will really use your mind in solving the mystery but at the same time you're enjoying this adventure with your friends.Mystery Manila and Break-out Manila are one of those unique places that should be visited not only for the Unique ambiance but also for its cool concept and mind-boggling experience .Not only you will be mentally challenged but also thrilled by what awaits you inside the rooms. This trip let you think and bring out the detective-personality in you.
